ComicInfo.Characters: Moot (first appearance, the caretaker of Martian machines)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:04:29 [Issue ID 4000-24876] urn:comicvine:4000-24876 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 11:58:38. [Issue ID 39292]
ComicInfo.Title: No Rust (Just Reality); Retreat from Fergusson
ComicInfo.Summary:
No Rust (Just Reality): Fawn and Morgana fall into the domain of Moot the caretaker, who is in charge of equipment maintenance on Mars.
Retreat from Fergusson: Daro and Pomru are left behind on a moon of gas giant Fergusson in a Dynamo class robosoldier as earth forces retreat from their unseen enemy.
ComicInfo.Writer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,John Ostrander,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,John Ostrander

ComicInfo.Inker: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Doug Rice,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Doug Rice
